blogPost.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
blogPost.body: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
blogPost.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams
blogPost.author: Arek Der-Sarkissian

localize.description: Covalent通过互动式在线破冰，帮助远程团队建立更好的联系。开始很简单：(1)找到一位朋友并访问我们的网站(2)按右上角的 "开始连接"(3)按 "主机 "然后按 "播放"。
Covalent通過互動式在線破冰，幫助遠程團隊建立更好的聯繫。開始很簡單：(1)找到一位朋友並訪問我們的網站(2)按右上角的 "開始連接"(3)按 "主機 "然後按 "播放"。

previous.title:
"Hi mom, margin is on the phone and they would like to speak with you."

-Liam, Robinhood trader since April 2020

localize.full_text:
"嗨，妈妈，保证金在电话里，他们想和你谈谈。"

-Liam，Robinhood交易员，自2020年4月起。

"嗨，媽媽，保證金在電話裏，他們想和你談談。"

-Liam，Robinhood交易員，自2020年4月起。

next.title:
The sell-off in high momentum stocks over the past few weeks is more than 3x larger than the broad market.

This is the sharpest momentum downturn on a relative basis that we've seen in quite some time.

$MTUM $SPY

Charting via @ycharts https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j

localize.full_text:
过去几周高动量股的抛售幅度是大盘的3倍多。

这是我们在相当长一段时间内看到的相对基础上最剧烈的动量下跌。

$MTUM $SPY

通过@ycharts绘制图表 https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j

過去幾周高動量股的拋售幅度是大盤的3倍多。

這是我們在相當長一段時間內看到的相對基礎上最劇烈的動量下跌。

$MTUM $SPY

通過@ycharts繪製圖表 https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j
